about.title: About AEIOU Healthcare
about.subtitle: Care. Comfort. Confidence.
paragraphs: Founded in 2021, AEIOU Healthcare Pvt. Ltd. is driven by a vision to bring high-quality, reliable healthcare products to the OTC (Over-the-Counter) market. Our leadership team brings together over 30 years of Pharmaceutical expertise, 25 years in IT, and 25 years in Quality Management, creating a strong foundation of experience, innovation, and trust.

At AEIOU Healthcare, we partner exclusively with reputable, ISO-certified third-party manufacturers to ensure every product meets the highest standards of safety, efficacy, and consistency. All our offerings are marketed under our own registered brand and trademark—reflecting our commitment to authenticity and excellence.

With a focus on customer well-being and a dedication to building a distinguished presence in the Commercial Trade Channel, we aim to deliver trusted healthcare solutions that make everyday life healthier and simpler.
